description:
Welcome to our Game 3008. This is a First Person Horror Game set in an abandoned Furniture Store/Parallel Universe. The Games is based around the fictional Story SCP-3008.   You play a father who has lost his son in this Store. You are trying to find him while carefully avoiding the danger that lurks inside the Store.  

 Controls:  W/A/S/D - Movement Shift - Sprinting CTRL - Crouching T - Flashlight Mouse 1 - Pick Up Things
